author: Jamie Ducharme
title: ‘We Don’t Blindly Accept Data.’ Top WHO Official Defends the Group’s Response to COVID-19
description: As the standoff between the World Health Organization (WHO) and the Trump Administration continues, a top WHO official is defending the organization’s efforts to gather and share information about COVID-19 with the world, despite “the politics in the way righ…
